mapper.select:
SELECT wc.course_code AS courseCode, wc.course_name AS courseName, wc.course_pic_name AS coursePicName, wcb.brand_name AS brandName, wc.course_pic_url AS coursePicUrl, wc. STATUS AS STATUS, wc.create_time AS createTime, t.start_class_time AS latelyStartClassTime, t.location AS latelyStartClassLocation, t.people_number AS peopleNumber, t.hours AS hours FROM wx_course wc JOIN wx_course_brand wcb ON wc.brand_code = wcb.brand_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT descStartClassRecord.course_code, descStartClassRecord.start_class_time, descStartClassRecord.location, descStartClassRecord.people_number, descStartClassRecord.hours FROM ( SELECT wscr.course_code, wscr.start_class_time, wscr.location, wscr.people_number, wscr.hours FROM wx_course_start_class_record wscr ORDER BY wscr.create_time DESC ) descStartClassRecord GROUP BY descStartClassRecord.course_code ) t ON t.course_code = wc.course_code
wc.status != 0
AND wc.status = #{status}
AND wc.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')
ORDER BY wc.create_time DESC

SELECT wc.course_code AS courseCode, wc.course_name AS courseName, wcb.brand_code AS brandCode, wcb.brand_name AS brandName, wc.course_description AS courseDescription, wc.course_pic_name AS coursePicName, wc.course_pic_url AS coursePicUrl, wc.course_info AS courseInfo, wc.`status` AS status, wc.classification_code AS classificationCode, wcc.classification_name AS classificationName FROM wx_course wc JOIN wx_course_brand wcb ON wc.brand_code = wcb.brand_code LEFT JOIN wx_course_classification wcc ON wc.classification_code = wcc.classification_code WHERE wc.course_code = #{courseCode}

SELECT wcp.param_code AS paramCode, wcpt.param_term_code AS paramTermCode, wcpt.param_name AS paramName, wcpt.param_type AS paramType, wcpt.param_choice AS paramChoice, GROUP_CONCAT(wcptv.param_value) AS paramValues FROM wx_course_param wcp JOIN wx_course_param_term wcpt ON wcpt.param_code = wcp.param_code JOIN wx_course_param_term_value wcptv ON wcptv.param_term_code = wcpt.param_term_code where wcp.classification_code = #{classificationCode} GROUP BY wcptv.param_term_code

SELECT wcpr.param_code AS paramCode, wcpr.param_term_code AS paramTermCode, wcpr.param_name AS paramName, wcpr.param_type AS paramType, wcpr.param_choice AS paramChoice, GROUP_CONCAT(wcpr.param_term_value) AS paramValues FROM wx_course_param_rel wcpr where wcpr.course_code = #{courseCode} GROUP BY wcpr.param_term_code

SELECT wc.course_code AS courseCode, wc.course_name AS courseName, wc.course_pic_name AS coursePicName, wc.course_pic_url AS coursePicUrl, t.latelyStartClassTime AS latelyStartClassTime, t1.minPrice AS minPrice FROM wx_course wc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT wscr.course_code, max(wscr.start_class_time) AS latelyStartClassTime FROM wx_course_start_class_record wscr GROUP BY wscr.course_code ) t ON t.course_code = wc.course_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT wscr.course_code, min(wscr.price) AS minPrice FROM wx_course_start_class_record wscr GROUP BY wscr.course_code ) t1 ON t1.course_code = wc.course_code JOIN wx_course_classification wcc3 on wcc3.classification_code = wc.classification_code JOIN wx_course_classification wcc2 on wcc3.classification_parent_code = wcc2.classification_code
wc.status != 0
AND wc.status = #{status}
AND wc.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')
AND wcc2.classification_code = #{classificationCode}
ORDER BY wc.create_time DESC
ORDER BY wc.create_time ASC
ORDER BY t.latelyStartClassTime DESC, wc.create_time DESC
ORDER BY t.latelyStartClassTime ASC, wc.create_time DESC
ORDER BY t1.minPrice DESC, wc.create_time DESC
ORDER BY t1.minPrice ASC, wc.create_time DESC

SELECT wc.course_code AS courseCode, wc.course_name AS courseName, wc.course_pic_name AS coursePicName, wc.course_pic_url AS coursePicUrl, t.start_class_time AS latelyStartClassTime, t.hours AS hours, IFNULL(t1.buyCount, 0) AS buyCount FROM wx_course wc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT descStartClassRecord.course_code, descStartClassRecord.start_class_time, descStartClassRecord.hours FROM ( SELECT wscr.course_code, wscr.start_class_time, wscr.hours FROM wx_course_start_class_record wscr WHERE wscr.course_code = #{courseCode} ORDER BY wscr.create_time DESC ) descStartClassRecord GROUP BY descStartClassRecord.course_code ) t ON t.course_code = wc.course_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT wcoi.course_code, count(1) AS buyCount FROM wx_course_order_item wcoi WHERE wcoi.course_code = #{courseCode} ) t1 ON t1.course_code = wc.course_code WHERE wc.course_code = #{courseCode}
